DOC.brief_title: A Cross-sectional Internet Survey Estimate Prevalence Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms ( LUTS )
DOC.detailed_description: The research question study pertain assess prevalence symptom specific bother LUTS impact HRQL , work productivity , mental sexual health across China , Taiwan South Korea , use late ICS definition . The research cross sectional population-representative internet survey among general population male female age 40 year old . The research would internet-based self-administration survey across China , Taiwan South Korea . The primary objective study determine prevalence low urinary tract symptom population age 40 year , China , Taiwan South Korea use late ICS definition . Secondary objective study : - To examine symptom-specific bother LUTS - To evaluate impact symptom health-related quality life , work productivity , mental sexual health use standard survey instrument - To explore difference prevalence LUTS across male female , across age group , across different socioeconomic stratum across China , Taiwan South Korea - To examine extent overlap void storage symptom among study participant - To explore treatment seek behavior determine treatment rate satisfaction current treatment
